description: Clive McNeil, who worked for Eurosport, Channel 4 and Manx Radio, died in a crash on Friday.
title: Clive McNeil: Tributes paid to Eurosport, Channel 4 and Manx Radio broadcaster
title_page: Clive McNeil: Tributes paid to Eurosport, Channel 4 and Manx Radio broadcaster - BBC News
maintext: He added that McNeil had had an "enormous passion for so many different genres of music... and his sense of fun and boundless energy will be sorely missed".
